ComparisonOperators
typedef struct
ComparisonOperators

The struct that defines various equality related operations related to objects.  Each struct of <type>_t needs to have a ComparisonOperator struct named "comparisonOperators" for the above macros to work.

Functions
eqOperator
bool (
*eqOperator
)(const void * const first, const void * const second, size_t size)

Defines if two objects of the same type are considered equal or not

Parameters
first

the first object to compare

second

the second object to compare

size

the size of the objects being compared

Returns

True if the two objects are equal, false otherwise

neqOperator
bool (
*neqOperator
)(const void * const first, const void * const second, size_t size)

Defines if two objects of the same type are considered not equal

Parameters
first

the first object to compare

second

the second object to compare

size

the size of the objects being compared

Returns

True if the two objects are not equal, false otherwise

gtOperator
bool (
*gtOperator
)(const void * const first, const void * const second, size_t size)

Defines if one object is greater than another object of the same type

Parameters
first

the first object to compare

second

the second object to compare

size

the size of the objects being compared

Returns

True if the first object is greater than the second object

ltOperator
bool (
*ltOperator
)(const void * const first, const void * const second, size_t size)

Defines if one object is less than another object of the same type

Parameters
first

the first object to compare

second

the second object to compare

size

the size of the objects being compared

Returns

True if the first object is less than the second object

gteOperator
bool (
*gteOperator
)(const void * const first, const void * const second, size_t size)

Defines if one object is greater than or equal to another object of the same type

Parameters
first

the first object to compare

second

the second object to compare

size

the size of the objects being compared

Returns

True if the first object is greater than or equal to the second object

lteOperator
bool (
*lteOperator
)(const void * const first, const void * const second, size_t size)

Defines if one object is less than or equal to another object of the same type

Parameters
first

the first object to compare

second

the second object to compare

size

the size of the objects being compared

Returns

True if the first object is less than or equal to the second object
